post.text: So what has the Clinton Foundation been up to? Helping millions of people get more affordable medicine to treat HIV/AIDS.

comment.author: Donavin
comment.text: I'm with you. I believe that the Clinton Foundation is doing much good in the world. However, I'd like to hear you explain why you've put Ken Salazar at the head of your transition team, giving his pro-fracking stance and his law firm's connection with big corporations, and his support of TPP (which you appear to have disavowed in conversation with Bernie Sanders). http://www.democracynow.org/2016/8/17/why_did_clinton_just_tap_a

replies.author: Tanisha
replies.text: Clinton Foundation gives 10% to the cause and keeps 90% for administration fees lol. What a joke. Chelsea Clinton gets a 3 million yearly salary from the Clinton Foundation. It's money laundering

replies.author: Cherokee
replies.text: Hi liar y Rob-Them Clinton Pay for play Lining her pockets LAUNDROMAT FOR CASH CLINTON FOUNDATION GREED

replies.author: Donavin
replies.text: Laine I read widely, real news sources and less real ones. I know how to read for facts. She did hire Salazar and he is pro-fracking. And I've read widely about the Clinton Foundation, too.
